title: Pls help me
body: I was playing an ARAM game, in the middle of it, my computer shut down and started doing a "configuration" update for windows without alerting me....I will now get a penalty which is unfair! If u know why I got this config update for windows 7 with no alert, pls let me know, thanks

replies.body: An account would only receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) after multiple leaves and not just one, so your account would need to have a history.  The best way to recover from this is by preventing further leaves, so I suggest setting up a schedule for your updates so it doesn't happen when you least expect it.  Let me know if that clears things up!
